pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## split annotationsThis package contains the Python implementation of [split annotations](), a system for optimizing applicationsthat combine many data-intensive library functions. See some useful links below.* [Documentation for this package](https://www.weld.rs/split-annotations/docs/)* [GitHub repository](https://www.github.com/weld-project/split-annotations)* [SOSP 2019 Paper describing the system](https://shoumik.xyz/static/papers/mozart-sosp19final.pdf)
